Articles.Content:
I was just wondering if someone could either do a mod or point me to a mod that alters the exhaust plume of the rocket, so that it expands the higher you go.

it would look something like this

![y5nhpso.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/y5nhpso.jpg)

> 
> I was just wondering if someone could either do a mod or point me to a mod that alters the exhaust plume of the rocket, so that it expands the higher you go.
> it would look something like this
> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/y5nhpso.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/y5nhpso.jpg)

Real plume.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129119-1-0-4-RealPlume-Stock-Configs-v0-4](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129119-1-0-4-RealPlume-Stock-Configs-v0-4)

> Real plume.
> [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129119-1-0-4-RealPlume-Stock-Configs-v0-4](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129119-1-0-4-RealPlume-Stock-Configs-v0-4)

This x100. One of my favorite VFX mods.
is this compatible with v1.0.5? if yes then which version of real plume is supported?
I'd recommend you go over and check the RealPlume thread and ask there. Honestly though, I 'd suggest you just upgrade to 1.1.2

> 
> 
> 22 hours ago, MrMeeb said:
> 
> 
> I'd recommend you go over and check the RealPlume thread and ask there. Honestly though, I 'd suggest you just upgrade to 1.1.2
> 

i have ksp v1.1.2, but the problem is, few mods are not supported with it. so, i love my mods very much, and when they all gets updated to v1.1.2, i will play with the same for sure....
